sentences.sContent: As regards phonology, the reverse is the case, Spanish differs more from Catalan than it does from Basque.
sentences.sContent_eng: As regards phonology, the reverse is the case, Spanish differs more from Catalan than it does from Basque.
sentences.sCn: 而在音韵学上，两者的情况则是完全相反的。 西班牙语的发音和巴斯克语的发音较为相似，而和加泰罗尼亚语相比则相去甚远。

sentences.sContent: Apart from questions of syntactic processing, they are also analysing the effect of age on the bilingual brain with respect to phonology, vocabulary and grammar, amongst other phenomena.
sentences.sContent_eng: Apart from questions of syntactic processing, they are also analysing the effect of age on the bilingual brain with respect to phonology, vocabulary and grammar, amongst other phenomena.
sentences.sCn: 除了分析语言造句的处理过程，他们也分析不同年龄的双语大脑在音韵学、词汇学以及语法的不同领域中所产生的现象。

words.tran: 有声的，浊音的；声音的，语音的；声学的
音标符号；录音片；语音图；形声字

trans.tranCn: 音系学；音韵学；语音体系
trans.tranOther: the study of the system of speech sounds in a language, or the system of sounds itself
